allow: Bash(git -C /Users/birdgg/Projects/moe-bangumi add moe-bangumi.cabal test/Main.hs src/Moe/App/ src/Moe/Core/ src/Moe/Effect/ src/Moe/Infra/ docs/ARCHITECTURE.md src/Moe/Bangumi/ src/Moe/Model/)

Bash(git -C /Users/birdgg/Projects/moe-bangumi commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor to Three Layer Cake + Effectful architecture

Restructure the codebase to follow the Three Layer Cake pattern with
Effectful for type-safe effect management:

- Layer 3 \(Core\): Pure business logic in Moe.Core.*
  - Move Moe.Bangumi.* to Moe.Core.Bangumi.*
  - Move Moe.Model.* to Moe.Core.Model.* \(without serialization\)

- Layer 2 \(Effect\): Effect definitions in Moe.Effect.*
  - Add Bangumi Effect with CRUD operations

- Layer 1 \(Infra\): Effect interpreters in Moe.Infra.*
  - Add SQLite interpreter for Bangumi Effect
  - Move FromRow/ToRow instances to Persistence.Schema

- Layer 1 \(App\): Application entry in Moe.App.*
  - Add Env, Error, Monad, and Run modules

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
